Interface EntityPacketEvent

    Since:

    0.1
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  EntityPacketEvent.EntityPacketType
      The types of packets that these events can fire for.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityPacketContext context()
      Gets the packet context of this event.
      EntityPacket getPacket()
      Gets the packet that this event is firing for.

    • Method Detail

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Gets whether or not this event has been cancelled.
        Returns:
        the cancellation state

      • setCancelled

        void setCancelled(boolean cancelled)
        Sets whether or not this event has been cancelled. If the event is cancelled, it will still be sent to other plugins, but not the client - unless another plugin un-cancels it.
        Parameters:
        cancelled - the cancellation state

      • getPlayer

        org.bukkit.entity.Player getPlayer()
        Gets the player that this event is firing for
        Returns:
        the player involved in this event

      • getPacket

        EntityPacket getPacket()
        Gets the packet that this event is firing for.
        Returns:
        the packet

      • getPacketType

        EntityPacketEvent.EntityPacketType getPacketType()
        Gets the packet type that this event is firing for.
        Returns:
        the packet type

      • context

        EntityPacketContext context()
        Gets the packet context of this event. Use this to queue packets to be sent afterwards.
        Returns:
        the packet context
